front.title: A JSON Meta Application Protocol (JMAP) Subprotocol for WebSocket

abstract.t: This document defines a binding for the JSON Meta Application Protocol (JMAP) over a WebSocket transport layer. The WebSocket binding for JMAP provides higher performance than the current HTTP binding for JMAP. Open Issues o Should push over WebSocket make use of the EventSource Last-Event- ID request header field (or a similar facility; e.g., as an extra query parameter)? And if so, where would the server state token be returned to the user? As a new property in the StateChange object?
